attributes.action: CHECK ALL FOREIGN NATIONALS 5 YEARS HISTORY AND THE MORE IN DEPTH SECURITY CHECKS WHAT POLICE HAVE INCLUDING EUROPEAN CITIZENS AND INCLUDING ONES ALREADY WORKING AT OUR AIRPORTS UNCHECKED!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its all very well saying these checks take too much time however it is unacceptable that airport staff and passengers are put at risk because its not convenient to have these checks. The same checks British citizens must undergo.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
